name: Visual Deal Pipeline
description: Kanban-style visual pipeline for managing deals through sales stages with drag-and-drop functionality.

prd.problemStatement: Sales teams struggle with managing multiple deals across different stages, lacking visual clarity on pipeline health and deal progression, which impacts forecasting accuracy and deal velocity.
goals: Provide visual representation of all deals in the pipeline
Enable easy deal stage progression with drag-and-drop
Give managers quick pipeline health visibility
Improve forecast accuracy through better stage management

successMetrics.target: Deals updated at least weekly (90% compliance)

inScope: Kanban board view with customizable stages
outOfScope: Custom pipeline views per user (v2 feature)

userStories: As a sales rep, I want to drag deals between stages so that I can quickly update my pipeline
As a sales manager, I want to view the entire team's pipeline so that I can forecast accurately
dependencies: Deal entity data model must be finalized
Company and contact modules must be operational
